intro: Anigozanthos rufus, commonly known as the red kangaroo paw, is a striking perennial plant native to Western Australia. It belongs to the family Haemodoraceae and is characterized by its vivid red, paw-shaped flowers that bloom in spring. The plant features linear, grass-like leaves and a robust root system adapted to arid conditions. It thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in coastal heathland environments. Anigozanthos rufus is a popular ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and resilience to drought.
